title: Ghost Riding
description: 2016 release, the sophomore album from the alt-rock group comprised of Jeff Ament (Pearl Jam), Joseph Arthur (Fistful of Mercy) and Richard Stuverud (The Fastbacks). Ghost Riding features 11 brilliant tracks that pull from all band members' influences.
